#summary Verify that a physical interface corresponds to a Web page

= Correspondence =

A method of verifying that a program resident on a microcontroller [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Correspondence_(theology) corresponds] to a particular web page is offered as an example. 

= Details =

{{{
void setup()
{
  Serial.begin(9600);
}

void loop()
{
  char in;
  if (Serial.available()) {
    in = Serial.read();
    if (in == '@') {
      Serial.print("{'host':'zambetti.com','path':'/projects/seriality/examples/relation.html','version':15}");
    }
  }
}
}}}
